thread.title: Take a Look at the Sneaker Heat on Show at Milan Men’s Fashion Week FW17
thread.title_full: Take a Look at the Sneaker Heat on Show at Milan Men’s Fashion Week FW17

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Take a Look at the Sneaker Heat on Show at Milan Men’s Fashion Week FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 18 images from this gallery. 
Milan Men’s Fashion Week FW17 is now well under way and Highsnobiety’s roaming team of photographers is firing in sets featuring the Italian capital’s stylish elite.
We’ve already seen some backstage action , some street style from outside the venues, and a dapper-looking Yung Lean — but now we turn our focus to sneakers. Photographer Eva Al Desnudo has snapped some of the freshest and most fire kicks on show this week so far, featuring the coveted Nike Air Max 97 “ Silver Bullet ,” YEEZYs, a dope pair of all-white FILAs, and head-turning Gucci joints.
Check out the kicks above.
After you’ve finished, take a first look at NikeLab and Stone Island’s Sock Dart .
